text: Gei au gaa mmada labelaa bolo ma iai nia duaadiga e haa, e hai be di mee dahi, dagidahi i baahi nia manu mouli aalaa. Gei nia duaadiga aalaa la koia e dingidingia gadoo be nia hadu hagalabagau, digaula huogodoo nadau duaadiga labelaa e hagapigi gi nadau wae baahi dau donu.10.9-10 Ezekiel 1.15-21
